attributes.additional_details: My friend from school plays late into the night and arrives to school late not in the right attitude for the day ahead.
attributes.background: Fortnite has changed how the younger generation think and from what I've seen children and teenagers have hurt themselves through acts from the game and staying up till late hours playing.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for banning specific games. That's the responsibility of the Video Standards Council, which is responsible in the UK for implementing the PEGI age rating system which is used in over 30 countries throughout Europe.

You can find out more here:

http://videostandards.org.uk/Home/
